00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 #include <stdlib.h>
00026 
00027 #include "simple_queue.hpp"
00028 #include "memory.hpp"
00029 
00030 namespace uStreamLib {
00031         SimpleQueue::SimpleQueue()
00032                 : _item(NULL), _in(NULL), _out(NULL), _items_count(0), _free_count(0)
00033         {
00034                 // nothing to do here
00035         }
00036 
00037         /*
00038          * TODO: improve memory deallocation if malloc fails.
00039          */
00040         int32 SimpleQueue::init(char* name, uint32 max_item_size, int32 capacity)
00041         {
00042                 queue_item* cur = NULL;
00043                 queue_item* pre = NULL;
00044                 int32 i = 0, ret = 0;
00045 
00046                 // initialize parent
00047                 ret = Queue::init(name, max_item_size, capacity);
00048                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00049                         return FAILURE;
00050 
00051                 // allocate memory for items
00052                 _item = (queue_item *) malloc(sizeof(queue_item));
00053                 if (!_item)
00054                         return FAILURE;
00055 
00056                 memset(_item, 0, sizeof(queue_item));
00057 
00058                 _item->prev = NULL;
00059                 _item->next = NULL;
00060                 _item->data = (char *) malloc(max_item_size);
00061                 if (!_item->data) {
00062                         free(_item); return FAILURE;
00063                 }
00064                 _item->size = max_item_size;
00065 
00066                 cur = _item;
00067 
00068                 for (i = 1; i < capacity; i++) {
00069                         cur->next = (queue_item *) malloc(sizeof(queue_item));
00070                         if (!cur->next) {
00071                                 free(_item); return FAILURE;
00072                         }
00073 
00074                         pre = cur;
00075                         cur = cur->next;
00076 
00077                         cur->prev = pre;
00078                         cur->data = (char *) malloc(max_item_size);
00079                         if (!cur->data) {
00080                                 free(_item); return FAILURE;
00081                         }
00082 
00083                         memset(_item, 0, sizeof(max_item_size));
00084 
00085                         cur->size = max_item_size;
00086                         cur->next = NULL;
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 _in = _item;
00090                 _out = _item;
00091 
00092                 _items_count = 0;
00093                 _free_count = capacity;
00094 
00095 #ifdef UOSUTIL_QUEUE_DEBUG
00096                 fprintf(stderr, "SimpleQueue: %s (capacity=%d, max_item_size=%d)\n",
00097                         getName(), capacity, max_item_size);
00098 #endif
00099 
00100                 // ok
00101                 setOk(true);
00102                 return SUCCESS;
00103         }
00104 
00105         int32 SimpleQueue::put(char* itm, uint32 size)
00106         {
00107                 if (_free_count <= 0)
00108                         return FAILURE;
00109                 if (!_in)
00110                         _in = _item;
00111 
00112 #ifdef UOSUTIL_QUEUE_DEBUG
00113                 if (_in)
00114                         fprintf(stderr, "%s:put(): [isz=%d,msz=%d,ic=%d/%d]\n", getName(),
00115                                 size, _item_size, _items_count + 1, _items_count + _free_count);
00116 #endif
00117 
00118                 _in->size = (size > _item_size) ? _item_size : size;
00119                 Memory::memCopy(_in->data, itm, _in->size);
00120                 _in = _in->next;
00121 
00122                 _items_count++;
00123                 _free_count--;
00124                 return SUCCESS;
00125         }
00126 
00127         int32 SimpleQueue::get(char* itm, uint32 size)
00128         {
00129                 if (_items_count <= 0)
00130                         return FAILURE;
00131                 if (!_out)
00132                         _out = _item;
00133 
00134 #ifdef UOSUTIL_QUEUE_DEBUG
00135                 if (_out)
00136                         fprintf(stderr, "%s:get():  [isz=%d,msz=%d,ic=%d/%d]\n",
00137                                 getName(), size, _item_size, _items_count - 1,
00138                                 _items_count + _free_count);
00139 #endif
00140 
00141                 Memory::memCopy(itm, _out->data,
00142                         (size < _out->size) ? size : _out->size);
00143                 _out = _out->next;
00144 
00145                 _items_count--;
00146                 _free_count++;
00147                 return SUCCESS;
00148         }
00149 
00150         SimpleQueue::~SimpleQueue(void)
00151         {
00152                 queue_item* cur;
00153                 queue_item* pre;
00154 
00155                 if (!_item)
00156                         return;
00157 
00158                 cur = _item;
00159                 while (cur) {
00160                         pre = cur;
00161                         cur = cur->next;
00162 
00163                         free(pre->data);
00164                         free(pre);
00165                 }
00166         }
00167 }
